00022 #include <stdlib.h>
00023 #include <stdio.h>
00024 #include <limits.h>
00025 #include <string.h>
00026 #include <vector>

00029 #include "vector_map.h"
00030 #include "popt_pp.h"
00031 #include "terminal_utils.h"
00032 #include "timer.h"

00035 using namespace std;
00036 
00037 
00038 bool run = true;
00039 int numSteps = 0;
00040 int debugLevel = 0;
00041 float minRange = 0.000001;
00042 float maxRange = 8.0;
00043 double resolution = 0.2;
00044 
00045 VectorMap *vectorMap;
00046 
00047 typedef struct{
00048   int taskIndex;
00049   int taskStart;
00050   int taskEnd;
00051 } task_t;
00052 
00053 vector<vector<int> > preRenderList;
00054 //Synchronization for threads
00055 int numThreads = 1;
00056 pthread_t* threads;
00057 vector<vector<int> >** sceneLines;
00058 vector<vector2i>** sceneLocations;
00059 int* threadProgress;
00060 
00061 vector<int> getUniqueValues(vector<int> &v)
00062 {
00063   vector<int> ret;
00064   ret.clear();
00065   for(int i=0; i<(int)v.size(); i++){
00066     if(v[i]<0)
00067       continue;
00068     bool found = false;
00069     for(int j=0; !found && j<(int)ret.size(); j++){
00070       found = (v[i]==ret[j]);
00071     }
00072     if(!found)
00073       ret.push_back(v[i]);
00074   }
00075   return ret;
00076 }
00077 
00078 void* PreRenderThread(void* arg)
00079 {
00080   static const bool BlankTest = false;
00081   
00082   task_t subTask = *((task_t*) arg);
00083   
00084   if(debugLevel>2) printf("Thread %d sub-task: %d - %d\n",subTask.taskIndex, subTask.taskStart,subTask.taskEnd);
00085   
00086   int w = ceil((vectorMap->maxX-vectorMap->minX)/resolution);
00087   vector2f loc;
00088   vector<vector<int> > * mySceneLines = new vector<vector<int> >();
00089   mySceneLines->clear();
00090   sceneLines[subTask.taskIndex] = mySceneLines;
00091   vector<vector2i> * mylocations = new vector<vector2i>();
00092   mylocations->clear();
00093   sceneLocations[subTask.taskIndex] = mylocations;
00094   
00095   threadProgress[subTask.taskIndex] = subTask.taskStart;
00096   for(int i=subTask.taskStart; i<=subTask.taskEnd; i++){
00097     double y = double(i)*resolution + vectorMap->minY;
00098     for(int j=0; j<w; j++){
00099       double x = double(j)*resolution + vectorMap->minX;
00100       loc.set(x,y);
00101       mylocations->push_back(vector2i(j,i));
00102       if(BlankTest){
00103         vector<int> list;
00104         list.push_back(1);
00105         list.push_back(0);
00106         mySceneLines->push_back(list); 
00107       }else{
00108         //mySceneLines->push_back(vectorMap->getSceneLines(loc,0.0,RAD(360),RAD(0.5),minRange,maxRange));
00109         mySceneLines->push_back(vectorMap->getSceneLines(loc,maxRange));
00110       }
00111       
00112       threadProgress[subTask.taskIndex] = i+1;
00113     }
00114   }
00115   return NULL;
00116 }
00117 
00118 void PreRenderMultiThread()
00119 {
00120   threads = (pthread_t*) malloc(numThreads*sizeof(pthread_t));
00121   
00122   int w = ceil((vectorMap->maxX-vectorMap->minX)/resolution);
00123   int h = ceil((vectorMap->maxY-vectorMap->minY)/resolution);
00124   vector2d loc;
00125   
00126   preRenderList.clear();
00127   
00128   printf("\nPre-Render Using %d threads.\n",numThreads);
00129   printf("Size: %d x %d\nResolution:%.3f\n",w, h, resolution);
00130   task_t subTasks[numThreads];
00131   int start = 0;
00132   int taskIncrement = h/numThreads;
00133   for(int i=0; i<numThreads; i++){
00134     subTasks[i].taskIndex = i;
00135     subTasks[i].taskStart = start;
00136     start += taskIncrement;
00137     subTasks[i].taskEnd = start-1;
00138   }
00139   subTasks[numThreads-1].taskEnd = h-1;
00140   
00141   //Allocate
00142   sceneLines = (vector<vector<int> > **) malloc(numThreads*sizeof(vector<vector<int> > *));
00143   sceneLocations = (vector<vector2i> **) malloc(numThreads*sizeof(vector<vector2i> *));
00144   threadProgress = (int*) malloc(numThreads*sizeof(int));
00145   
00146   //Fork
00147   double tStart = GetTimeSec();
00148   for(int i=0; i<numThreads; i++){
00149     pthread_create( &threads[i], NULL, PreRenderThread, (void*) &subTasks[i]);
00150   }
00151   
00152   //Monitor Progress
00153   bool done=false;
00154   while(!done){
00155     Sleep(0.1);
00156     done = true;
00157     double totalProgress = 0.0;
00158     printf("\rThread Progress: ");
00159     for(int i=0;i<numThreads; i++){
00160       printf("%6.2f%%   ",double(threadProgress[i]-subTasks[i].taskStart)/double(subTasks[i].taskEnd-subTasks[i].taskStart+1)*100.0);
00161       //printf("%6.2f%%   ",double(threadProgress[i]));
00162       done = done && (threadProgress[i]>subTasks[i].taskEnd);
00163       totalProgress += double(threadProgress[i]-subTasks[i].taskStart)/double(subTasks[i].taskEnd-subTasks[i].taskStart+1)*100.0;
00164     }
00165     printf("Total: %6.2f%%  ",totalProgress/double(numThreads));
00166     fflush(stdout);
00167   }
00168   
00169   //Join
00170   for(int i=0; i<numThreads; i++){
00171     pthread_join(threads[i],NULL);
00172   }
00173   
00174   double tDuration = GetTimeSec()-tStart;
00175   printf("\nDone Rendering in %.3fs, Saving to file...\n", tDuration);
00176   FILE* fidstats = fopen("pre_render_stats.txt","a");
00177   fprintf(fidstats, "%d, %d, %f\n",h*w,numThreads,tDuration);
00178   fclose(fidstats);
00179   
00180   //Combine all the data
00181   static const bool debugLines = false;
00182   char renderFile[4096];
00183   snprintf(renderFile, 4095,"./maps/%s/%s_render.dat",vectorMap->mapName.c_str(),vectorMap->mapName.c_str());
00184   FILE* fid = fopen(renderFile,"w+");
00185   printf("Saving to %s\n",renderFile);
00186 
00187   fwrite(&w,sizeof(int),1,fid);
00188   fwrite(&h,sizeof(int),1,fid);
00189   fwrite(&resolution,sizeof(double),1,fid);
00190   for(int i=0; i<numThreads;i++){
00191     const vector<vector<int> > &partScene = *sceneLines[i];
00192     int numLocs = partScene.size();
00193     for(int j=0; j<numLocs; j++){
00194       int x = sceneLocations[i]->at(j).x;
00195       int y = sceneLocations[i]->at(j).y;
00196       if(debugLines){
00197         printf("loc:%5d,%5d, lines:",x,y);
00198         for(unsigned int k=0; k<partScene[j].size(); k++){
00199           printf(" %3d", partScene[j][k]);
00200         }
00201         printf("\n");
00202       }
00203       fwrite(&x,sizeof(int),1,fid);
00204       fwrite(&y,sizeof(int),1,fid);
00205       int size = partScene[j].size();
00206       fwrite(&size,sizeof(int),1,fid);
00207       fwrite(partScene[j].data(),sizeof(int),size,fid);
00208     }
00209   }
00210 }
00211 
00212 int main(int argc, char** argv)
00213 {  
00214   //========================== Set up Command line parameters =======================
00215   char *map_name = (char*) malloc(4096);
00216   snprintf(map_name, 4095, "GHC7");
00217   
00218   static struct poptOption options[] = {
00219     { "map-name",         'm', POPT_ARG_STRING , &map_name,       0, "Map name",              "STRING"},
00220     { "debug",            'd', POPT_ARG_INT,     &debugLevel,     0, "Debug Level",           "NUM"},
00221     { "num-threads",      'n', POPT_ARG_INT,     &numThreads,     0, "Num Threads",           "NUM"},
00222     { "render-resolution",'r', POPT_ARG_DOUBLE,  &resolution,     0, "Render Resolution",     "NUM"},
00223     
00224     POPT_AUTOHELP
00225     { NULL, 0, 0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL }
00226   };
00227   // parse options
00228   POpt popt(NULL,argc,(const char**)argv,options,0);
00229   int c;
00230   while((c = popt.getNextOpt()) >= 0){
00231   }
00232   
00233   //========================= Welcome screen, Load map & log ========================
00234   __attribute__ (unused) int sysReturn = system("clear\n");
00235   
00236   ColourTerminal(TerminalUtils::TERMINAL_COL_GREEN,TerminalUtils::TERMINAL_COL_BLACK,TerminalUtils::TERMINAL_ATTR_BRIGHT);
00237   printf("\nVector Localization Pre-Render Optimization\n\n");
00238   ResetTerminal();
00239   
00240   printf("Map: %s\n",map_name);
00241   printf("Num Threads: %d\n",numThreads);
00242   //Read Map
00243   vectorMap = new VectorMap(map_name,"./maps",false);
00244   
00245   InitHandleStop(&run);
00246   PreRenderMultiThread();
00247   
00248   printf("closing.\n");
00249   return 0;
00250 }
